website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you are looking for a reliable swivel seesaw without the high price.
pros: Can rotate 360° while moving up and down
Length can be adjusted to fit in smaller spaces
Can also be adjusted to accommodate older or taller children
Weight capacity of 75 pounds per seat
cons: May be a hazard for some smaller children, especially if riding with another child of unequal weight

customer_reviews.title: The product was pretty much as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my grand kids. It was easy to put together (about half an hour) and all of the parts were clearly marked except the bolts. There are three different lengths, all very close in size and hard to tell which is for what. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and stable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seesaw and easy to assemble! My 8 year old and 4 year old love this! We keep it on our entryway during the cold and rainy months and it works perfectly on the rug. They love going around and around! It’s very light and easy to move but very stable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KSNTX

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 6 yo grandsons love this. It not only goes up and down but it spins. They play Star Wars rocket and spend hours with it. They have not had any problems. It has some adjustments for size.
customer_reviews.author: ChasD

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble with easy-to-follow instructions. Took one person about 45 minutes. This is a sturdy unit - well made and finished. Bright colors look great. Comes with all hardware and tools on an individually identified blister pack. Tool size allows tightening without over torque. Separate the balance bar from the base at the swivel for easier transport.
customer_reviews.author: Punz

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this! Very strong and sturdy. My boys are 6 and 3. This will last as they get older.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my niece and nephew. They absolutely love it they are 3 1/2 and 1 1/2 so they will hopefully get a few years out of it
customer_reviews.author: LYMC

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: Very fun but I wish the plastic stopped were sturdier and thicker. It is making chips in my cement- I'll buy new thicker stoppers for the end of the seesaw.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my niece (age 5) and nephew (age 8), they love it! Easy to assemble, all screws were labelled.
customer_reviews.author: S.Guertin

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I just got this 3 days ago and it broke the first time my kids used it! The plastic seat makes it useless my daughter weighs 65 lbs it’s supposed to be heavy duty and hold up to 175lb . I guess not
customer_reviews.author: jenniferfrazier

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not sturdy or heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: NOT HEAVY DUTY! This product was supposed to be delivered on Friday, but came Monday and not delivered where I asked for them to put it. Also, we were home, yet they didn’t ring the doorbell. So much for delivery instructions. It’s cheap looking and I was expecting something sturdier. it’s a cute teeter totter, but both kids have to weigh about the same otherwise they can’t swivel, or go up and down without someone helping on one side. I’m disappointed and would return it, but it’s a pain to take it a part and send it back. I definitely don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Overall great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Sturdy, but light and easy to move. My only complaint is the handle bars are a little short to fit bigger kids legs under. With the weight being able to hold larger kids, I would think the bars wouldn’t be made solely for smaller kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: KBSH4

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This teeter totter ROCKS. Have had it for months and it’s still vibrant from Texas heat and sun, it’s still clean and sturdy and the kids LOOOOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: HannahT

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I, the mother, put this together on my own in about 30-45 minutes. It was super easy, the instructions were easy to follow. It’s super sturdy and I absolutely love the 360 swivel on it. My daughter gets a kick out of being able to spin while she’s playing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 1 and 3 year old have been on it all day! Very sturdy. I was able to assemble it myself in about 2 hours thanks to all the "help" they wanted to give. Colors are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: L. Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Kids will enjoy for hours
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids. The spinning features makes it extra fun. The paint is not the greatest so not sure how it will resist chipping and rust after a few rainy seasons. The quality otherwise is good and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Mr Q

customer_reviews.title: Vary fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this. They have been spinning around and play on it every time we go outside. The one thing I would change is the rubber pieces on the ends that stop the kids from hitting the ground so hard, they don't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Rahschulte

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this were so mixed, I wasn’t sure what to think. I hoped the great reviews were what we would get. Upon putting it together, it looks great and the kids had a blast on it. BUT the screws are constantly falling out. It has to be fixed multiple times any time they play with it. It’s disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and won’t fall apart
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great item! Mom and Dad we’re on it with the kids . It’s very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: kimberley fox

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am excited about this sea saw - it is for my grandchildren ages 2 - 11. I am surprised that the 2 year old rides it the most. With a gym bag with weight in it on one seat, the baby rides in the other seat and bounces and pushes it around with one foot. She can go fast that way and LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Hannon

customer_reviews.title: Fun and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We had this for 2 days now and the kids (7 and 10) had been on it. The 360 degree turn feature is their favorite. My 10 years old and I assembled it. However, you do need a strong adult to tighten all the screws. The adjustment on length is pretty limited. We had to add a little bit more weight on the 7yrs old side (45 lbs) to go with the 10yrs old (80lbs) even after the length adjustment. But they found their rhythm. I (110lbs) went on with the 10yrs old and it was fun for me as well.
customer_reviews.author: aloha

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: All the parts were present. Easy to put together. Put it together by myself. My son loves it. It’s easy to move around without taking it completely apart. if you want to take it outside and back in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jayv

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.  Her Mom rides it with her.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my great granddaughter who is 6 years old. She absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Srnovrsnik

customer_reviews.title: The seesaw is too low to ground
customer_reviews.text: The seesaw is only a foot off the ground. I ordered heavy duty because older kids were going to use it. Too low to ground! Center pole too short!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Poirier

customer_reviews.title: looks like it could be a nice seesaw but....
customer_reviews.text: the holes do not match up. the black tube inside is blocking the holes. and the peices do not fit together. very dissappointing. Looks can be deceiving. This is one of those times. .
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: waist of money STRONG DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: EVERY TIME A STUDENT GOT ON THESE, A SCREW OR BOLT WOULD FALL OUT. They would not stay put together no matter what we tried, and one of the handles fell off, looked rusted inside. My students did not get more than 30 minutes of use out of these. We ended up putting them by the garbage dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: saved summer during Covid-19
customer_reviews.text: my kids love it... I wish it was a 4 seater but thats next. Only negative is the screws for the handles keep coming lose... some loctite will fix it though
customer_reviews.author: Nicolai B.

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Have been outdoor for a year now in sun rain and snow and still works as new. Kids love it. Easily movable when mowing grass.
customer_reviews.author: A_Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughters love it! Wish you could adjust the height of it, and the plastic seats could be a bit more sturdy but it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Not a safe product, hard to assemble, would definitely not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome seesaw! My 5 year old daughter was thrilled. It’s sturdy, and seems to be strong and durable. She helped me assemble it in our living room and it was so simple. Great product! Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4-7 year old grand children love, love this seesaw!! This one is very study! Well worth the money. Other parents that saw it are interested in buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina F

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got for our grandkids for Christmas and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor activity !
customer_reviews.text: My daughter & her friends love this!! Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Ann Lamontagne

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Fun
customer_reviews.text: The 360 see saw goes round and round pretty fast. I Purchase this see saw as a gift for my grandchildren age 5 & 7 They love having something so fun in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Barraco

customer_reviews.title: Easter purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 7 and 2 yo! The seats seem a little flimsy though. I can see having to replace them in the future. Took about 3 weeks to receive due to covid 19.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seat broke very fast.
customer_reviews.text: The seat broke within the first week. My kids love this thing but it’s dangerous to play with it now. I wish I could buy seat replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Beata O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Sermon illustration
customer_reviews.text: I used as an illustration in a sermon to say that when we go down there is always someone to bring us back up.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Metoyer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandsons two and four, they love it. Great addition to their backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Tami K

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Both handlebars are missing from the box. I’m not happy. This shouldn’t even be an issue at this price. I need handlebars sent to me at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: My kids are 3.5 and almost 5
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and nobody has broken any bones yet! My kids are petite so it's a little difficult for them to get on and off but they have LOTS of growing room, this should last them til their double digits.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Biondo

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The holes in this were not aligned and we couldn’t put the seat on both sides. I called and they wanted me to take apart and return it in order to get a full refund or not they would only refund me $27.
customer_reviews.author: Ivana B

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. And kids love it and provided entertainment during quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Weld
customer_reviews.text: The handle weld broke after less than a week of use. Seemed like a sturdy piece but in hindsight not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Faye

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and sturdy enough for a small adult to play on with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: Pure Fun Heavy Duty 360 Kids Swivel Seesaw, Indoor or Outdoor, Ages 4+
product_meta.description: The Pure Fun Heavy Duty Swivel See Saw not only goes up and down, but swivels 360 Degree as well! The durable double steel frame, soft, easy grip handles and comfortable molded plastic seats make the swivel see saw a backyard favorite for any fun-loving kid! Parents love it too, because it's sturdy, safe and makes kids want to play outside! Heavy duty double steel tubing and a durable powder coat finish means this see saw will stand up to the elements to provide years of fun! A secure stopper with rubber bottom is attached under each seat for added safety. The Pure Fun Heavy Duty Swivel See Saw is ASTM, TUV/GS and CE Certified for maximum child safety. Recommended for ages 4 +, and up to 175 lbs per seat.
feature_bullets: Durable double steel frame, soft, easy grip handles and comfortable molded plastic seats
360 degree swivel feature along with traditional up and down seesaw fun
Powder coated finish to stand up to elements
Secure stopper underneath seats for added safety
